formatDescription: DCT is a proprietary audio file format developed by NCH Software for their dictation software. As well as audio data, .dct files also contain dictation header information and can be encrypted.
provenanceCompoundName: The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints / The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints

internalSignatures.name: NCH Dictation Audio File
internalSignatures.note: Format consists of header, then RIFF WAVE audio data, which can be PCM or MP3. The audio data may also be encrypted, in which case the RIFF chunk is not visible, but a flag is set. The file may also include a transcription file, again for which a flag is set.
